subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Teammates say Anthony Davis is the first player at the gym, that he listens and learns, and that he doesn’t carry himself like the No. 1 overall pick in last summer’s N.B.A. draft.
snippet: Teammates say Anthony Davis is the first player at the gym, that he listens and learns, and that he doesn’t carry himself like the No. 1 overall pick in last summer’s N.B.A. draft.
